title: Map makers
creator_credit: Australia. Army. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: This film shows the work carried out by the members of the Royal Australian Survey Corps in South Vietnam, Sumatra, North Western Australia and Bendigo in Victoria in the production of various types of maps.
